title: similar gothic font
content:
hi to all  
someone have an idea what is a similar font like this?  
thanx

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071129212439im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/concerto_3681.jpg)

 [‹ I.D magazine font ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20071129212439/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39479 "Go to previous forum topic") [A ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071129212439/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39500 "Go to next forum topic")
author: rockberto

comments.content: Similar? You could try [Koch-Fraktur](http://web.archive.org/web/20071129212439/http:/www.fraktur.com/) (\> Fraktur) – of course not as far as the caps are concerned.
